Suggested_Setup: A landslide, collapsed bridge, or fallen tree blocks the path.
A door/chest requires a code, pattern, or sequence to open.
Toxic air fills the room; players must plug vents or find fresh air pockets.
Pressure plates must be triggered simultaneously or with specific weights.
Light beams must be reflected/refracted to hit a specific sensor.
A statue/voice demands the answer to a riddle to open the way.
A confusing area where wrong turns teleport/loop players back to the start.
A room is filling with water/sand; players must find the exit mechanism quickly.
A mechanism is broken; players must find/craft a replacement part.
The ground is dangerous; players must traverse via furniture/platforms.
The room's orientation changes; players must navigate walls/ceilings.
A door opens only when a specific tone/song is played or silence is maintained.
Instructions are in a dead language; players must decipher context clues.
The party is split by a falling gate; they must work together from separate sides.
Two levers: one saves the loot, one saves an NPC. Can't choose both.
A bridge looks broken but is solid (or vice versa). Players must see through it.
A complex machine is jammed; players must remove debris in the right order.
A lock requires fire, ice, or lightning damage to activate.
Clues are only visible from a specific height or viewing angle.
The door requires a small amount of blood, gold, or magic to open.
